attributes.action: ask the Queen to disolve Parliament and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition for the disolvement of parliament and a general election and therefore the removal of Gordon Brown as Prime Minister. Let the British public decide if they want Gordon Brown as Prime Minister and if they want a government that penalises the worse off (i.e. 10p faisco) or the retrospective road tax policy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
